secretary wrote:

>don't you love how I come up with subject lines which attracts

We all _know_ it's really just a carp hatched plot to distract us and 
infiltrate our minds.... (yes, I do belong to the conspiracy theory of 
the week club --ha!)

>My question is...why is there a pic of those cute chickens? >>
>
Theory 1--Okita had his pig Hijikata had  his chickens?

Theory 2---Hijikata was always chasing chicks of the HUMAN* variety
(*that one's for Miss B)

Theory 3---there is no theory 3

Theory 4--- (courtesy of my daughter the quasi-Okita reincarnation) The 
Shinsengumi were poor and could only afford chickens for their little 
farmyard.

(yes, I also subscribe to the crack-pot theory of the month club)

-Sigh- Don't you people remember he was a farm boy?!  What kind of farmer 
doesn't have chickens?!  The family is OBVIOUSLY just reminding him of his 
origins so he doesn't get too full of himself in the afterlife with all us fangirls 
drooling over him. 


-MissBehavin (Grew up on a farm. Doesn't like chickens unless they're fried. 
Thinks that's the REAL reason Hijikata advocated the consumption of the nasty 
fowls by the Shinsengumi.)
